## Functions

### unfold() {#a37fd6f31f78116956f457b105ab4513c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;DFAJumpThreading.cpp&#125;::unfold (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreeupdater">DomTreeUpdater</a> &#42; DTU, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> &#42; LI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-dfajumpthreading-cpp-/selectinsttounfold">SelectInstToUnfold</a> SIToUnfold, std::vector&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-dfajumpthreading-cpp-/selectinsttounfold">SelectInstToUnfold</a> &gt; &#42; NewSIsToUnfold, std::vector&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; &gt; &#42; NewBBs)</>}>
Unfold the select instruction held in <code>SIToUnfold</code> by replacing it with control flow.

Put newly discovered select instructions into <code>NewSIsToUnfold</code>. Put newly created basic blocks into <code>NewBBs</code>.

TODO: merge it with CodeGenPrepare::optimizeSelectInst() if possible.
